text.text: How do you create a manual claim in ZOLL Billing?

text: To create a manual claim in ZOLL Billing, you can use the Waystar Submission page. To start, hover over Claims on the navigation bar and click Waystar Submission. Click "Submit claims".

text.text: What are the steps to initiate the creation of a manual claim in ZOLL Billing?

text: To create a manual claim in ZOLL Billing, you can use the Create Claims page. To start, hover over Claims on the navigation bar and click Create Claims.

text.text: Can you explain how to navigate to the manual claim creation page in ZOLL Billing?

text: To create a manual claim in ZOLL Billing, you can use the Create Claims page. To start, hover over Claims on the navigation bar and click Create Claims.

text.text: What information is required to create a manual claim in ZOLL Billing?

text: To create a manual claim in ZOLL Billing, you need to complete a claim in manual claim creation. You also need to update a payer on the Claim page or run the eligibility check on the Claim page.

text.text: How do you add patient details when creating a manual claim in ZOLL Billing?

text: To add patient details when creating a manual claim in ZOLL Billing, you can click the edit icon next to the patient's name on the Claim page. This will take you to the patient's account page. You can also check the list of existing patient records. If you don't see a match, you can select Nope to create a new patient record.

text.text: What options are available for finding patient insurance information during manual claim creation in ZOLL Billing?

text: To find patient insurance information during manual claim creation in ZOLL Billing, you can use the Insurance Finder tool. This tool helps to determine if the patient's insurance information is accurate prior to billing. It can also identify replacement payers, third party liability, remaining deductible, or any additional information that may indicate a different payer should be billed.

text.text: Can you describe the process of determining the level of service in ZOLL Billing's manual claim creation?

text: To determine the level of service in ZOLL Billing's manual claim creation, you need to select a level of service button. The place of service will auto populate with a 41 or 42 depending on the level of service you select. You can move backwards to a previous tab if needed.

text.text: How do you add diagnosis codes to a manual claim in ZOLL Billing?

text: To add diagnosis codes to a manual claim in ZOLL Billing, you need to click the Add Diagnosis button. This will open the Diagnosis Codes window. You can then select the diagnosis code from the list.

text.text: What steps are involved in reviewing and finalizing charges when creating a manual claim in ZOLL Billing?

text: When creating a manual claim in ZOLL Billing, you can finalize charges by verifying the payer and charges. If either are not correct, you can go back and correct the issue using the tabs at the top of the page. You can also add notes at any time during the creation of the claim.

text.text: How can you find incomplete claims assigned to you in ZOLL Billing?

text: To find incomplete claims assigned to you in ZOLL Billing, you can click Dashboard on the navigation bar and look under "Claim assignments & reminders". If there are claims that are assigned to users, they will display here. You can also click the Work button associated with the incomplete claims.

text.text: Can you explain how to reassign an incomplete claim to another user in ZOLL Billing?

text: To reassign an incomplete claim to another user in ZOLL Billing, you can use the Advanced Search Results page. You can assign one or multiple claims at once by clicking the row the claim is in. The system will remove the claim from the previous owner's Inbox and display it in the new assignee's Inbox.

text.text: Where can you view incomplete claims assigned to you in ZOLL Billing?

text: To find incomplete claims assigned to you in ZOLL Billing, you can click Dashboard on the navigation bar and look under "Claim assignments & reminders". If there are claims that are assigned to users, they will display here. You can also click the Work button associated with the incomplete claims.

text.text: What options are available for editing incomplete claims in ZOLL Billing's Inbox?

text: To edit incomplete claims in ZOLL Billing's Inbox, you can click the Edit button. This will open the Claim page. You can then make changes to the claim and click Save.

text.text: How do you change the assigned user for an incomplete claim in ZOLL Billing?

text: To change the assigned user for an incomplete claim in ZOLL Billing, you can use the Claim page. You can also use the Search Results page to assign or reassign claims.

text.text: Can you clarify the process of completing a manual claim creation in ZOLL Billing?

text: To complete a manual claim creation in ZOLL Billing, you can verify the payer and charges, and include notes and an emergency indicator if needed. You can then click Complete the claim to submit the claim to the clearinghouse.

To reassign an incomplete claim, you can click on the incomplete claim in your Inbox or find it through the Dashboard. Then, click the edit icon next to the "Assigned to" field and select a name from the list. The incomplete claim will now display in the Inbox of the person you selected.

text.text: Finding incomplete claims assigned to you

text: To find incomplete claims assigned to you, you can click on the incomplete claim in your Inbox or find it through the Dashboard.
